thread.title: Dr Dre sued by former cleaner following 'unfair dismissal' from £1,200-a-week job
thread.title_full: Dr Dre sued by former cleaner following 'unfair dismissal' from £1,200-a-week job

title: Dr Dre sued by former cleaner following 'unfair dismissal' from £1,200-a-week job
text: Rosie O'Donnell Sued By Ex-'View' Producer 00:52 Rosie O'Donnell is being sued by a former senior producer of The View show, claiming the co-host of the ABC daytime program got her fired by slandering her in front of the show’s other producers and staff. Jennifer Shepard-Brookman claims she was fired in 2015 after having worked on The View since... You Might Like
